fields.description:
Especially in our examples. I traced the problem down to the bundled styles. Given that most likely our users use them too, we better fix that in the code rather than working around with runner changes.

Of course, runner changes are possible - we can insert the stylesheets statically and use noStyle. This will be a (relatively) large change, though.
